abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, remove 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Vileplume is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

effect.en: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads. Vileplume is now Confused (after doing damage).
